prompt: A vibrant underwater scene highlighting a pair of rare, majestic manta rays gliding gracefully through a kaleidoscope of colorful corals and exotic aquatic plants. The mantas exhibit mystical, radiant patterns on their wings, emitting a faint glow that illuminates the surrounding reef. In the background, diverse marine life swims amidst the coral formations, with shimmering light rays penetrating the clear waters, adding an ethereal quality to the scene. The image is rich in bright, detailed colors and textures, capturing the enchanting allure of the Great Undersea Reef.
